item.description:
I just wrote a new meditation called “Spirit’s Kisses”, and I am totally blissed-out. I can’t wait to share it with you!

This evening we’ll do two guided meditations to relax and feel expanded Love and Spirit. We’ll also be doing a process to connect you to your inner wisdom by traveling through time to your future, wise, old self! It’s called the Sage Advice Process.

I promise you, you will leave feeling deeply relaxed, nurtured and enveloped in loving energy, and feeling good.

So please join us! The more people we have, the better the collective energy and experience. I love doing this with you!

All are welcome. This is a public event. The class is appropriate whether you are a beginner to meditating, or experienced. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Forward this to your friends, family and groups.

A big thank you to Wayland Wellness for co-sponsoring this evening with us!

“Ann’s guided meditation was heavenly. With a soothing voice and joyful manner, Ann skillfully guided me, and a room full of others, to a place of happiness. For me it was sheer joy. After having been gently guided to experience absolute physical and mental relaxation, I experienced one of the most profoundly powerful moments I have felt because I was able to access pure love and joy. I am grateful to Ann for her gentle and loving manner and her skill and dedication. I look forward to working with her again and again. “ Renee J. Montana LMT, NCMT

Space is limited, so registration is required. Please only RSVP if you know you can attend, so no one will be left out unnecessarily, and let us know if your plans change, too.

*** If you prefer to meditate lying down, please bring whatever you might need to be comfortable: mat, pillow, blanket, etc.

Looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann
item.how_to_find_us: go to back of lobby, we'll be upstairs.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free Evening of Guided Meditations and more
